data.name: Performapal ClassiKuriboh
data.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ] When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack, destroy this card.
[ Monster Effect ] If this card is destroyed by its own Pendulum Effect: End the Battle Phase. You can only use each of the following effects of "Performapal ClassiKuriboh" once per turn. You can discard this card, then target 1 card in your Pendulum Zone; its Pendulum Scale becomes 1 until the end of this turn. When you take battle damage while this card is in your GY: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.
